titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to convey for scrapping to the Mariners' Museum in Newport News, Virginia, a vessel in the National Defense Reserve Fleet that is scheduled to be scrapped.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee On Merchant Marine.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.3059.

bill.summary: 6/22/1994--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to convey to the Mariners' Museum (Newport News, Virginia) a certain National Defense Reserve Fleet vessel scheduled to be scrapped.
